source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	    [No_],
        [Document Type],
        [Sell-to Customer No_],
        [Bill-to Customer No_],
        [Ship-to Code],
        [Ship-to Name]
        [Ship-to Name 2],
        [Ship-to Address],
        [Ship-to Address 2],
        [Ship-to City],
        [Ship-to Contact],
        [Order Date],
        [Posting Date],
        [Shipment Date],
        [Shipment Method Code],
        [Location Code],
        [Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
        [Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
        [Customer Posting Group],
        [Loading Slip No.],
        [Customer Group Code],
        [AutoPDASO],
        [Order is Placed],
        [Finance Control]
        [Channel],
        [Short Close],
        [ECOM],
        [Mannual Route order],
        '10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Header]
where year([Posting Date])= 2021
UNION ALL
Select 
        [No_],
        [Document Type],
        [Sell-to Customer No_],
        [Bill-to Customer No_],
        [Ship-to Code],
